titleStmt.title: One of the sermons preach't to the Lords of the High Court of Parliament, in their solemne fast held on Ashwednesday, Feb. 18 And by their appointment published: by Ios: Exon.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Flesher, for Nath. Butter,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
